section.p: A patrol of militiamen - mercenaries in the pay of the dictator, General Grieve Marlock - stop you in the street.

p.if: If you have the codeword Assassin, immediately.
If not, but you are a Protector of Sokara, they greet you politely and salute. You return to the city centre without incident - .

section.p:
Otherwise they decide you will be arrested unless you pay 15 Shards as ‘taxes’. If you refuse, or don’t have 15 Shards, .
If you hand over the money, cross it off and the militiamen leave you alone - turn back to 10.
